name: Lillia
title: the Bashful Bloom
shortBio: Intensely shy, the fae fawn Lillia skittishly wanders Ionia's forests. Hiding just out of sight of mortals—whose mysterious natures have long captivated, but intimidated, her—Lillia hopes to discover why their dreams no longer reach the ancient Dreaming Tree. She now travels Ionia with a magical branch in hand, in an effort to find people's unrealized dreams. Only then can Lillia herself bloom and help others untangle their fears to find the sparkle within. Eep!

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Lillia

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

skins.description: A shy fawn spirit, Lillia once served as the guardian of a sacred Ionian forest—until her grove was destroyed and cast into flame. Consumed by loss, she now slumbers in the spirit realm, reliving the destruction in an unending nightmare—unaware of the timid hope still waiting to bloom...

skins.name: Nightbringer Lillia

chromas.name: Nightbringer Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Nightbringer Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

skins.description: Steward of nightmares, demon of dreams, Lillia revels in twisted fantasias that mortify mortal minds. Though she dallies in the war between order and chaos, she rarely joins the fray herself; she has a garden to tend to, after all, sowing seeds of terror and watching them bloom.

skins.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Lillia

chromas.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Every day, the Sun Bird flies between two sacred trees: the western Tree of Dawn and the eastern Tree of Dusk. Lillia is a spirit of rejuvenation and the Sun Bird's caretaker. A steward of time and seasons, she uses her censer to spread a calming mist as she carries the bird home at night.

skins.name: Faerie Court Lillia

chromas.name: Faerie Court Lillia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Lady of the Winter Court and Keeper of the Seelie Heart-tree, Lillia records the history of the Faerie Queendoms in the ancient tree's rings, freezing events into forested, ever-growing archives. When Lillia discovers that someone has tried to tamper with her work, however, she must rally her courage—there is trouble afoot!

passive.name: Dream-Laden Bough
passive.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

spells.name: Blooming Blows
spells.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Lillia's Ability hits grant @PranceSpeed@ Move Speed for @PranceDuration@ seconds, stacking up to @PranceMaxStacks@ times.

Active: Lillia whirls her censer, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage, plus an additional @BonusTrueDamage@ true damage at the outer edge.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Watch Out! Eep!
spells.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.
spells.dynamicDescription: Lillia winds up a huge strike, dealing <magicDamage>@FlatDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies in the center take <magicDamage>@FlatDamageSweetSpot@ damage</magicDamage> instead.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Swirlseed
spells.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.
spells.dynamicDescription: Lillia lobs a swirlseed overhead, dealing <magicDamage>@ImpactDamageTotal@ magic damage</magicDamage> where it lands and revealing and <status>Slowing</status> them by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds. If no enemies are hit, the seed rolls until it hits an enemy or collides with terrain.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Lilting Lullaby
spells.description: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lillia causes all enemy champions with Dream Dust to become Drowsy for @DrowsyDuration@ seconds. Afterward, they fall Asleep for @SleepDuration@ seconds.

When awakened by damage, they take an additional @TotalDamage@ magic damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
